<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Mirror-Risen](/Feats.aspx?ID=3793) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Lineage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=317" />
<trait label="Reflection" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=431" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 120</row>

</column>

---

You were created from magic involving mirrors and still retain some ability to seek refuge in reflected illusions. You gain the Mirror's Trickery reaction. 

**Mirror's Trickery** <actions string="Reaction" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [illusion](/Traits.aspx?ID=92), [occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120), [visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=163)) **Frequency** once per day; **Trigger** You would be hit by a Strike; **Effect** You create an illusory duplicate at the last instant and attempt to trick your foe into striking it instead of you. The attacker attempts a DC 11 flat check; on a failure, the attack hits the duplicate, changing the result from a critical success to a success or a success to a failure.

<title level="2">Mirror-Risen leads to...</title>
[Mirror Refuge](/Feats.aspx?ID=3801), [Reflective Pocket](/Feats.aspx?ID=3798)
name: Mirror-Risen
